page.title: 05CLUBS
page.content: There are many well attended clubs in the village.Adults sporting clubs include: soccer,netball, cricket and tug of war which compete against other village teams. Other clubs include:Women's Institute, National Housewives Register,The Over Players drama group,Church bell ringers, British Legion, Over 60's, and the school P.T.A. Children's clubs include: soccer and netball; Brownies, Guides,Beavers, Cubs and Scouts are connected with St. Mary's church.A Mother and Toddlers group also exists.The Methodists hold a junior games night, the Baptists have a weekly Mothers and Toddlers afternoon, a monthly Over 30's club, weekly clubs for Juniors,'JUCOS' for younger teenagers and 'Covenanters' for older teenagers.
